name: Dodge the Projectiles
description:
Dodge the Projectiles! is a 2D Side Scrolling platformer. All you do in the game, judging by the name, you dodge incoming projectiles to keep your score streak going! But beware, if you get hit by one projectile, then your run ends.

This game is set to put your reactions to the test, with a random chance of your controls becoming inverted.

It is simple of how to play Dodge the Projectiles!
Use the arrow keys to move your cube up, down, left or right to dodge incoming projectiles that can end your run in one hit. The controls can as well randomly go inverted, which can put you off guard when you least expect it coming. Always be ready.

-8-Bit sounds belong to; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W0WUEx1kpcE
-8-Bit Showdown belongs to: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/548279
-Dodge the Projectiles belongs to: Photo_Negative_Mickey (me)
